item.title: Ovalâ€™s Annual Photography Show
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Some of Christine's photography has been accepted over at Oval's Annual Photography Show in downtown Orlando! The exhibit starts on June 17th and runs for a month. There's a reception on Thursday (the 17th) from 5PM - 10PM, Oval is located at: 29 South Orange Ave. (corner of Orange and Pine) in downtown Orlando, so stop on by if you're in the area.
